DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy prophylactic intravesical chemotherapy ( different chemotherapy drug dosage regimen ) prevention bladder recurrence nephroureterectomy upper tract urothelial carcinoma ( UTUC ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Intravesical Chemotherapy Prevent Bladder Tumors After Nephroureterectomy Primary Upper Urinary Tract Urothelial Carcinomas
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients clinically diagnose UTUC 2 . Treated radical nephroureterectomy 1 . Distant metastasis 2 . Prior history bladder synchronous bladder cancer 3 . Administration neoadjuvant chemotherapy 4 . Presence severe complication .
